Customer_ID,Account_Creation_Date,Customer_Type,Gender,Total_Spend,Number_of_Orders,Age,Preferred_Payment_Method,Email,Customer_Address,Phone_Number,Last_Order_Date,Customer_Name,Date_of_Birth from tduser.Customer_Info"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"enableTrim":"N","easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"isAutoRepartition":"N","databaseName":"","failComponentWhenDatasetEmpty":"N","componentId":2,"componentName":"oracle_data","tableName":"oracle_data","category":"Source","componentType":"JDBC","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"AWS_Oracle","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{"dbTable":"select CUSTOMER_ID,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,GENDER,DATE_OF_BIRTH,AGE,EMAIL,PHONE_NUMBER,ADDRESS_LINE1,ADDRESS_LINE2,CITY,STATE,POSTAL_CODE,COUNTRY,ACCOUNT_CREATION_DATE,CUSTOMER_TYPE,TOTAL_SPEND,NUMBER_OF_ORDERS,LAST_ORDER_DATE,PREFERRED_PAYMENT_METHOD from SH.CUSTOMER_INFO"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":5,"componentName":"Country_missing","tableName":"Country_missing","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[2],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT
    Customer_ID,
    First_Name || ' ' || Last_Name AS Customer_Name,
    TRIM(BOTH ', ' FROM
        NVL(Address_Line1, '') ||
        CASE WHEN Address_Line2 IS NOT NULL THEN ', ' || Address_Line2 ELSE '' END ||
        CASE WHEN City IS NOT NULL THEN ', ' || City ELSE '' END ||
        CASE WHEN State IS NOT NULL THEN ', ' || State ELSE '' END ||
        CASE 
            WHEN Country IS NOT NULL 
                 AND UPPER(SUBSTR(Country,1,1)) != 'S'
                THEN ', ' || Country
            ELSE ''
        END ||
        CASE WHEN Postal_Code IS NOT NULL THEN ', ' || Postal_Code ELSE '' END
    ) AS Customer_Address,
    Gender,
    Date_of_Birth,
    Age,
    Phone_Number,
    Account_Creation_Date,
    Customer_Type,
    Total_Spend,
    Number_of_Orders,
    Last_Order_Date,
    Preferred_Payment_Method,
    Email
FROM
    oracle_data;
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"sourceDataFrame":"teradata_data","targetDataFrame":"Country_missing","mapping":[{"sourceColumn":"Customer_ID","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"Customer_ID","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"Y","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"Account_Creation_Date","sourceType":"date","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"date","targetColumn":"ACCOUNT_CREATION_DATE","targetType":"DateType","targetDataFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","targetTypeChange":"Y","orginalTargetType":"timestamp","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"Customer_Type","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"CUSTOMER_TYPE","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"Gender","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"GENDER","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"Total_Spend","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"TOTAL_SPEND","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","ha
